content: nubby brim cloche crochet pattern copyright august 2004 eileen tepper materials chunky weight yarn i love bernat softee chunky crochet hook size k basic pattern for cloche is 1 half_double_crochet in front loop only 1 half_double_crochet in back loop only so where pattern calls for two half_double_crochet in one stitch one half_double_crochet will be in the back loop and one will be in the front loop chain 3 join with slip_stitch to form a ring round 1 chain 2 counts as first half_double_crochet 7 half_double_crochet in ring do not join at the end of rounds 8 half_double_crochet round 2 2 half_double_crochet in each half_double_crochet 16 half_double_crochet round 3 *1 half_double_crochet in next half_double_crochet 2 half_double_crochet in next half_double_crochet in next half_double_crochet* 48 half_double_crochet rnds 7-15 1 half_double_crochet in each half_double_crochet around join with slip_stitch in next half_double_crochet end basic pattern round 16 chain 3 for first double_crochet 1 double_crochet in each half_double_crochet around join this is the round that the ribbon is threaded through round 17 chain 1 single_crochet in same stitch and in each double_crochet around join round 18 chain 1 single_crochet in same stitch *1 single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet* 1 single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet join round 19 1 row even join round 20 chain 1 single_crochet in same stitch *1 single_crochet in next 8 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet* 1 single_crochet in next 8 single_crochet join round 21-23 1 single_crochet in each single_crochet around join with slip_stitch and end with new piece of yarn chain 132 1 slip_stitch into each chain end thread ribbon through round 16 over 3 double crochets under 1 etc tie in a bow
